MapOf

MapOf<T>: Map<keyof T, any>
  • Defined in src/lib/state.ts:17

A typed (immutable) Map whose keys are parameterized to be the union type of all the keys of T.

ModalRegistry

ModalRegistry: { remove: Function; replace: any }
  • Defined in src/modal-controller.ts:18

Registry for a modal that offers callbacks to remove the modal or replace it with another template.
